description: Claim barred by statute of limitations
facts: Statute of limitations for personal injury is 2 years
asp_facts: claim(c1). claim_type(c1, statute_of_limitations). plaintiff(c1, plaintiff). defendant(c1, defendant). forum(c1, state_court). injury_year(c1, 2018). filing_year(c1, 2021). limitations_period_years(c1, 2). time_elapsed_years(c1, 3). tolling(c1, no). discovery_rule(c1, no). claim_timely(c1, no).
question: Is the personal injury claim time-barred?
rationale: The statute of limitations bars claims filed after the limitations period expires. Here, the 2-year period expired on January 1, 2020, but the lawsuit was filed in 2021. With no tolling, the claim is time-barred.
